name: git-worktrees
title: Git Worktrees
description: Efficiently managing Git worktrees with actions for cloning, listing, adding, renaming and removing worktrees within projects
author: philstainer

commands.name: clone-project
commands.title: Clone Project
commands.subtitle: Git Worktrees
commands.description: Clones and sets up bare repo

preferences.name: projectsPath
preferences.title: Projects Path
preferences.description: The path to the folder containing your projects

preferences.label: Enable Worktree Caching
preferences.name: enableWorktreeCaching
preferences.title: Enable Worktree Caching
preferences.description: Enable caching of worktrees to avoid scanning directories every time (you can clear it by using the "Clear Cache" command)

preferences.label: Enable Worktree Grouping
preferences.name: enableWorktreesGrouping
preferences.title: Enable Worktree Grouping
preferences.description: Enable grouping of worktrees by project

preferences.label: Enable Projects Frecency Sorting
preferences.name: enableProjectsFrequencySorting
preferences.title: Enable Projects Frecency Sorting
preferences.description: Enable sorting of projects by frequency

preferences.label: Enable Worktrees Frecency Sorting
preferences.name: enableWorktreesFrequencySorting
preferences.title: Enable Worktrees Frecency Sorting
preferences.description: Enable sorting of worktrees by frequency

preferences.name: maxScanningLevels
preferences.title: Max Scanning Levels (folder recursion)
preferences.description: The max number of levels to scan for projects

preferences.name: shouldAutomaticallyPushWorktree
preferences.title: Should Automatically Push Worktree
preferences.description: Should automatically push worktree after adding or renaming

preferences.label: Skip Git Hooks When Pushing
preferences.name: skipGitHooksWhenPushing
preferences.title: Skip Git Hooks When Pushing
preferences.description: Skip git hooks when pushing new branches to remote

preferences.name: shouldAutomaticallyOpenWorktree
preferences.title: Should Automatically Open Worktree
preferences.description: Should automatically open worktree after creation

preferences.label: Resize Editor Window After Launch
preferences.name: resizeEditorWindowAfterLaunch
preferences.title: Resize Editor Window After Launch
preferences.description: Resize the editor window after launching a project

preferences.name: windowResizeMode
preferences.title: Resize Mode
preferences.description: The mode to use when resizing the editor window

preferences.name: branchPrefixesToRemove
preferences.title: Branch Prefixes to Remove
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of prefixes to automatically remove when pasting branch names (e.g., 'git checkout -b ,checkout -b ,git switch -c ')

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
